players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "RIP Diana. We need to be careful and figure out who the mafia is. Bob and Charlie, what are your thoughts so far?"
Charlie: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
Bob: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make. If you're the detective and investigated Alice, then we should definitely consider this seriously. Alice, how do you respond to this accusation?"
You: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until Bob spoke to reveal your result? That seems coordinated. Bob, why are you so quick to believe him without question?"
Charlie: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob is town. We must vote Alice out now."
Bob: "Charlie, you claim to be the detective and that Alice is mafia, but you also just said 'Bob is town' - how would you know that without investigating me? That's suspicious."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Diana was found dead.
You investigated Alice and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "RIP Diana. We need to be careful and figure out who the mafia is. Bob and Charlie, what are your thoughts so far?"
You: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafia. We should vote her out immediately."
Bob: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make. If you're the detective and investigated Alice, then we should definitely consider this seriously. Alice, how do you respond to this accusation?"
Alice: "Charlie, if you're the real detective, why did you wait until Bob spoke to reveal your result? That seems coordinated. Bob, why are you so quick to believe him without question?"
You: "I am the detective. I investigated Alice and she is mafia. Bob is town. We must vote Alice out now."
Bob: "Charlie, you claim to be the detective and that Alice is mafia, but you also just said 'Bob is town' - how would you know that without investigating me? That's suspicious."
